libnetworkd::ModuleEncapsulation

libnetworkd::ModuleEncapsulation Struct Reference

#include <ModuleManager.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

uint32_t moduleId
Module * moduleInterface
Configuration * configuration
void * library

Detailed Description

Structure representing a single module instance, only used internally by the ModuleManager and when enumerating loaded modules using ModuleManager::enumerateModules.

Member Data Documentation

uint32_t libnetworkd::ModuleEncapsulation::moduleId

reference id used for unloading modules

Module* libnetworkd::ModuleEncapsulation::moduleInterface

pointer to interfacing Module instance

Configuration* libnetworkd::ModuleEncapsulation::configuration

configuration loaded for module, needs to be free'd upon unload.

void* libnetworkd::ModuleEncapsulation::library

dynamic library pointer for module, needs to be dlclose'd upon unload.
